name: 1password-ui
description: 1Password UI tab for OpenClaw dashboard - manage secrets and credential mappings
author: OpenClaw Community

credential_read.description: Reads secrets from 1Password via CLI or Connect API when requested by skills
credential_read.mitigation: Secrets only read on explicit request, never exposed to UI

mapping_storage.mitigation: File contains references only (item/vault names), not actual secrets

external_api.description: Calls 1Password Connect API if configured (Docker mode)

securityNotes.secret_handling: The UI never calls readSecret. However, readSecret IS available via gateway RPC for skill use. Security relies on: (1) user being signed into 1Password, (2) gateway being loopback-only.
securityNotes.mapping_file: Contains item/vault/field references, not actual credential values.
securityNotes.cli_auth: Uses 1Password app integration for biometric auth when available.
securityNotes.gateway_exposure: All 1password.* methods are gateway RPC calls. Protect your gateway accordingly.

installWarnings: Requires code changes to OpenClaw source (see INSTALL_INSTRUCTIONS.md)
CLI mode requires 1Password desktop app with CLI integration enabled
Docker mode requires 1Password Connect server deployment
